story-moment.NEWEST GLADIATOR: After Thor was brought to him by Valkyrie, the Grandmaster showed interest in the potential of his newest gladiator.
story-moment.GRANDMASTER DISPLEASED: The Grandmaster was displeased by Thor’s impressive showing against his beloved champion, Hulk, ultimately incapacitating Thor with a Control Disc.
story-moment.THE ESCAPE: After the Hulk vanished with Thor, the Grandmaster asks the Sakaar citizens to assist in finding them, while also ordering Loki and Valkyrie to track them down.
story-moment.A TIE: With the revolution against him a success, the Grandmaster tries to declare it a tie, taking credit for his own integral role in what occurred upon Sakaar.

powers+abilities.MELT STICK: While not normally getting his hands dirty himself, the Grandmaster will at times use his Melt Stick to rid himself of those who have notably displeased him.
powers+abilities.CONTROL DISKS: The Grandmaster keeps his enslaved gladiators in line using Control Discs that can instantly incapacitate with the touch of a button from a remote.
powers+abilities.FLEET: The Grandmaster has a notable fleet at his disposal, including both combat and pleasure ships.
